notes.note: **Enable Siri shortcuts on Firefox (Requires iOS 12)** - Perform tasks quickly on Firefox by using Siri shortcuts.
**Clear specific website data** - Clear individual website data, in addition to clearing data across all sites.
**Sync improvements** - A more reliable way to send tabs between your devices. Also, upgrading to a new device should now result in a much smoother experience.
**Performance improvements** - Searching in the URL bar or using the history panel will be much smoother on older devices.

text: This version of Firefox for iOS has several usability and performance improvements.
title: Firefox for iOS 14.0 Release
